name: Bullet Hell Testing
description:
This game is going to be a 1st person bullet hell style of game using a low-poly model and neon colours to give it a certain aesthetic. This page is for the functional demo and it's main goal it to collect feedback from testers on the game in its current state.

When in the game, can you explore the scene and shoot at the enemies. Thanks and enjoy the demo!
